Description:
Account managers are responsible for building and maintaining relationships with clients, identifying and closing new business opportunities, and providing customer support and service. They play a vital role in the success of any business.Responsibilities:Build and maintain relationships with clients
Understand client needs and requirements
Identify and close new business opportunities
Manage the sales pipeline
Provide customer support and service
Track and report on sales performanceSkills
Skills:
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Ability to build rapport and trust with clients
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Proficient in CRM software
Knowledge of the industry
